title: Recruitments
description: We successfully launched our annual recruitment drive, inviting students interested in fine arts, design, and photography to join Malang. The drive featured an application process for various sub-clubs and teams within the organization.

title: Exhibition: Orientation Program
description: Introduced Malang to freshers through a vibrant display of student artworks, photography portfolios, and interactive fine arts activities.

title: Workshop: Video Editing with Team Clixzy
description: A hands-on workshop for photographers and visual artists on video editing techniques, covering software tools and creative processes for motion content.

title: Farewell
description: A farewell event to celebrate the achievements of the graduating batch of 2025, featuring speeches, performances, and a nostalgic look back at their creative projects and journey with Malang.

title: Fashion Euphoria: Bharatiyam
description: We successfully hosted a large-scale Fashion Show and Competition that drew participants from multiple universities. The event showcased student creativity across three dynamic categories: Solo, Duet, and Group. Malang's photography and design teams were instrumental in organizing and capturing this vibrant celebration of style and design.

title: Rangotsav: Bharatiyam
description: A vibrant cultural festival where students and faculty members express their creativity through photography and traditional and contemporary art forms like rangoli and painting.

title: Orientation Program
description: An introductory session for freshers to learn about Malang, its various art and photography sub-clubs, and how to get involved in our creative community.

title: Fashion Euphoria: Bharatiyam
description: A major event where Malang's photography and design teams collaborate to showcase the latest trends and student-designed outfits, celebrating creativity and style.

title: Rangotsav: Bharatiyam
description: A vibrant cultural festival where students and faculty members express their creativity through photography and traditional and contemporary art forms like rangoli and painting.

title: Workshop: Mandala Art
description: A practical workshop focused on the techniques and meditative practice of creating intricate Mandala designs, a key fine art form.

title: Workshop: Photography with GStudios India
description: A specialized workshop led by GStudios India covering advanced photography techniques, lighting, and post-processing, essential skills for aspiring club members.

title: Orientation Program
description: An introductory session for new members to learn about Malang, its various art and photography domains and how to get involved in our creative community.
